titleStmt.title: The assemblie of foules Here foloweth the assemble of foules veray pleasaunt and compendyous to rede or here compyled by the preclared and famous clerke Geffray Chaucer.
Parliament of fowls
titleStmt.author: Chaucer, Geoffrey, d. 1400.
Copland, Robert, fl. 1508-1547.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Flete strete at the sygne of the Sonne agaynste the condyte, by me Wynkyn de Worde,
publicationStmt.date: The. xxiiij. day of Ianuary, in the yere of our lorde. M.CCCCC.[et]xxx. [1530]]

notesStmt.note: Includes two poems by Robert Copland.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the sygne of the Sonne agaynste the condyte
